destinations.name: Madeira
destinations.description: A beautiful archipelago known for its stunning landscapes, botanical gardens, and hiking trails.

destinations.name: Bali
destinations.description: A popular tourist destination known for its beautiful beaches, rice terraces, and vibrant culture.
destinations.bestTimeToVisit: April to May and September to October

destinations.name: Paris
destinations.description: The city of lights and love, known for its art, fashion, and culture.

destinations.name: Oranjestad
destinations.description: The capital city of Aruba, known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant culture.

destinations.name: Willemstad
destinations.description: The capital city of Curacao, known for its colorful Dutch colonial architecture.

destinations.name: Kralendijk
destinations.description: The capital city of Bonaire, known for its stunning coral reefs and diving spots.

destinations.name: Ystad
destinations.description: A charming town in southern Sweden, known for its medieval architecture and beautiful beaches.

destinations.name: Mallorca
destinations.description: A popular island destination known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and stunning landscapes.

destinationDetails.name: Madeira
destinationDetails.description: A beautiful archipelago known for its stunning landscapes, botanical gardens, and hiking trails.

attractions.name: Laurisilva Forest
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage forest with unique flora and fauna.

attractions.name: Cabo Girão Skywalk
attractions.description: Glass-floored skywalk on one of Europe's highest sea cliffs.

localCuisine.name: Espetada
localCuisine.description: Grilled beef skewers seasoned with garlic and bay leaves.

localCuisine.name: Bolo do Caco
localCuisine.description: Traditional flatbread served with garlic butter.

culturalTips.tip: Try the local Poncha drink, but drink responsibly.
Tipping is appreciated but not mandatory in restaurants.

destinationDetails.name: Bali
destinationDetails.description: A popular tourist destination known for its beautiful beaches, rice terraces, and vibrant culture.
destinationDetails.bestTimeToVisit: April to May and September to October

attractions.name: Uluwatu Temple
attractions.description: A stunning sea temple perched on a cliff, offering breathtaking sunset views.

attractions.name: Jatiluwih Rice Terraces
attractions.description: Famous rice terraces known for their beautiful landscapes and traditional Balinese irrigation system.

image.description: Jatiluwih Rice Terraces in the rain

localCuisine.name: Nasi Goreng
localCuisine.description: Indonesian fried rice dish typically served with a fried egg on top.

localCuisine.name: Beef Rendang
localCuisine.description: A rich and tender coconut beef stew slow-cooked with spices.
localCuisine.bestPlaceToTry: Mayasari Restaurant, Maya Ubud Resort & Spa

culturalTips.tip: Always use your right hand when giving or receiving something, as the left hand is considered unclean.
When visiting temples, dress modestly and wear a sarong and sash, which are often provided at the entrance.

destinationDetails.name: Paris
destinationDetails.description: The city of lights and love, known for its art, fashion, and culture.

attractions.name: Eiffel Tower
attractions.description: Iconic Paris landmark offering panoramic city views.

attractions.name: Louvre Museum
attractions.description: World's largest art museum and a historic monument.

localCuisine.name: Croissant
localCuisine.description: Flaky, buttery pastry, a French breakfast staple.

localCuisine.name: Coq au Vin
localCuisine.description: Chicken braised with wine, mushrooms, and bacon.

image.description: Coq au Vin served in a bowl

culturalTips.tip: Greet with 'Bonjour' and say 'Merci' when leaving.

destinationDetails.name: Oranjestad
destinationDetails.description: The capital city of Aruba, known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant culture.

attractions.name: Eagle Beach
attractions.description: One of the most beautiful beaches in Aruba.

image.description: Eagle Beach with Divi Divi trees

attractions.name: Aruba Aloe Factory
attractions.description: Tour the oldest aloe factory in the world.

localCuisine.name: Keshi Yena
localCuisine.description: Stuffed cheese dish with chicken or beef.

localCuisine.name: Pastechi
localCuisine.description: Fried pastry filled with cheese, meat, or fish.

culturalTips.tip: Try local Papiamento phrases to connect with locals.
Beachwear is for the beach; dress casually elsewhere.

destinationDetails.name: Willemstad
destinationDetails.description: The capital city of Curacao, known for its colorful Dutch colonial architecture.

attractions.name: Queen Emma Bridge
attractions.description: Floating pontoon bridge connecting Punda and Otrobanda.

attractions.name: Handelskade
attractions.description: Colorful waterfront buildings, iconic to Willemstad.

localCuisine.name: Stoba
localCuisine.description: Traditional stew made with beef or goat.

localCuisine.name: Funchi
localCuisine.description: Cornmeal side dish similar to polenta.

culturalTips.tip: Respect the colorful architecture; it's a UNESCO site.
Try the local Blue Curacao liqueur.

destinationDetails.name: Kralendijk
destinationDetails.description: The capital city of Bonaire, known for its stunning coral reefs and diving spots.

attractions.name: Bonaire National Marine Park
attractions.description: Protected marine park with world-class diving.

attractions.name: Salt Pans
attractions.description: Pink salt flats and flamingo habitats.

localCuisine.name: Pastechi
localCuisine.description: Fried pastry filled with cheese or meat.

culturalTips.tip: Respect marine life; do not touch coral.
Try local goat dishes for an authentic taste.

destinationDetails.name: Ystad
destinationDetails.description: A charming town in southern Sweden, known for its medieval architecture and beautiful beaches.

attractions.name: Ystad Abbey
attractions.description: Historic abbey dating back to the 13th century.

attractions.name: Ystad Beach
attractions.description: Popular sandy beach for swimming and relaxation.

localCuisine.name: Prinsesstårta
localCuisine.description: Green marzipan cake filled with cream and jam.

culturalTips.tip: Remove shoes when entering Swedish homes.
Try fika, the Swedish coffee break tradition.

destinationDetails.name: Mallorca
destinationDetails.description: A popular island destination known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and stunning landscapes.

attractions.name: Serra de Tramuntana
attractions.description: Mountain range ideal for hiking and cycling.

localCuisine.name: Ensaimada
localCuisine.description: Sweet spiral pastry dusted with powdered sugar.

localCuisine.name: Tumbet
localCuisine.description: Vegetable casserole with potatoes, eggplant, and peppers.

culturalTips.tip: Lunch is late; expect restaurants to open after 1 PM.
Try local wines from Binissalem region.
